item.title: One question please someone answer
item.dc:creator: @pawelwoj pawelwoj
item.description:
@pawelwoj wrote:

i added
::bank
and ::home
commands and i wanna set them that u cannot use at wildy how will it look?
bank command is:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("bank")) { openUpBank(); } }
and home command is: if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sM("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { toX = 3087; toY = 3500; sM("You teleport to Home."); }
could someone edit it ( add public boolean wildybank (home) = true; (or something like that)
Pawel
